summary: Europol Agent Tom Brindle (Timothy Hutton) is called to Barcelona, Spain, to track down the notorious serial killer known as Pygmalion.
cast: Timothy Hutton|Miguel Ángel Silvestre|Fernando Guillén Cuervo|Tània Sarrias|Ivana Miño|Dominik Garcia|Brendan Price|Anna Lluch|Pep Torrents|Igor Pavluchenco|Angelina Llongueras|Albert Pérez|Tony Corvillo|Estel Solé|Abel Folk|Cristóbal Calvente|Rubén Arroyo|Romina Cocca|Colin Morgan|Laura Cotenescu|Víctor Tejera|Alain Hernández|Álvaro Garriga|Eva Sampons|Altana Lorenzo|Bruna Pino|Sheila Fernández|Fran Carnacea|Sabina Mateu|Jairo Martínez|Francisco Andreo|Patricia Ruiz|Alicia Viton|Joe Lewis|Piero Verzello
title: Reflections
